Folk-
	Here is my article which originally appeared in the To-Ron, the 
newsletter of the Northern California Japanese Sword Club. I apologize 
for some the spacing errors, not sure but we think it a PC vs Mac 
thing. In spite of that I think you can work out everything I am 
saying. I hope you find it distracting...
-t
